import React,{useState} from 'react' import { useSelector,useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { deleteTodo,updateTodo } from '../../redux'; const TodoList = () => { const data = { title: '', description: '' } const listTask = useSelector( state=>state.listTask) const dispatch = useDispatch() const [taskUpdate, setTaskUpdate] = useState(data) const [update, setUpdate] = useState('') const showInputUpdate = (id,taskToUpdate)=>{ setUpdate(id) setTaskUpdate(taskToUpdate) } const hanldeUpdate = (id)=>{ dispatch(updateTodo(taskUpdate,id)) setUpdate('') setTaskUpdate('') } const displayTask = listTask.map(task=>( {task.id} { update == task.id ? ( <> setTaskUpdate(e.target.value)} /> setTaskUpdate(e.target.value)} /> ) : ( <> {task.task} {task.task} ) } { update == task.id ? () : ( ) } )) return (

List Task

{displayTask}
# Title Todo Update Delete
) } export default TodoList
